data.actual_result: On Light theme they have a mismatching background color
data.expected_result: The two options suggesting to add server icon and invite people should be properly themed
data.short_description: The two options in the "Welcome to your server" section don't adapt to Light theme
data.steps_to_repro: - Switch to Light theme - Go to the top channel of a server you own - Look at the "Welcome to your server" section
